translation.en: ♪ I get up in the evening ♪
♪ And I ain't got nothing to say ♪
It really hasn't dated at all.
Don't let the fact that I've made A-team every year add to the pressure.
translation.ko: 이 형님은 매년 A팀에 뽑혔다는 사실에 부담 갖진 마

translation.en: Can we please get this crap off?
translation.ko: 이 쓰레기 좀 끄면 안 돼?

translation.en: -All right, mate. -Hey. You're not playing, Adam?
Sorry. It's Dads V Lads. I... forgot.
Right, it looks like we've found our goalie.
Here's to total humiliation by kids.
Speak for yourself. I thought I had a good game.
[Adam] Oh, god. He's putting up a flip chart.
[man] Wait till he hands out the agenda.
Tell her I've been on teacher trips. I know what goes on.
translation.ko: 교사 연수는 나도 가봤어 어떤 건지 잘 안다고

translation.en: [Corinne] Aw, it's tough, it's really tough.
I'm currently recuperating after a hot bath and two glasses of Rioja.
translation.ko: 따끈한 물에 목욕하고 와인 두 잔 하면서 쉬는 중이야

translation.en: Well, me and the boys are on a pub crawl.
Hey, listen, did you know it was dads and lads?
translation.ko: 참, 오늘 아빠 대 아들 경기인 거 알았어?

translation.en: Yeah, I wrote it on the note.
-What note? -The one that's attached to the fridge.
translation.ko: - 무슨 쪽지? - 냉장고에 붙여 놓은 거

translation.en: Listen, will you text me when you know which team he's on?
Oh, God, I hope it's the A.
Tom's really winding him up, and this Ryan swearing thing...
translation.ko: 톰은 동생 약 올리고 라이언은 욕까지 하더라니까

translation.en: I know. God, it's a nightmare.
Potty-mouthed little prick. Takes after his mother.
translation.ko: 입 더러운 자식 엄마 닮아서 그래

translation.en: Ah, yeah, well, I'm... I'm just gutted I can't be there.
I think you've done this on purpose.
I don't think there even is a conference. I'm gonna ask the other teachers.
translation.ko: 학회도 가짜 아냐? 다른 교사한테 물어본다?

translation.en: Actually, know what? I better get going.
I have got dinner in half an hour.
All right, love. Well, you enjoy yourself.
Oh, yeah, I will. I fully intend to.
Wife left you to it, has she?
So have you got a kid playing in the match or what?
You didn't have to stay with her, you know.
Corinne. You didn't have to stay when she told you she was pregnant.
translation.ko: 커린이 임신했다고 했을 때 주저앉을 필요 없었다고요

translation.en: I'm sorry. Do... do I know you?
Two years ago, she told you she was pregnant, right?
She told you she was pregnant and then she lost the baby.
She made it up. She was never pregnant.
Who are you? Why are you saying this?
translation.ko: 당신 누구야? 왜 그런 말을 하는데?

translation.en: Think of me as a stranger. A stranger that knows.
translation.ko: 그냥 낯선 사람이라 쳐요 뭔가를 아는 낯선 사람

translation.en: Cast your mind back to that time. Did you ever see her naked?
translation.ko: 그 당시 일을 잘 생각해 봐요 옷 벗은 거 본 적 있어요?

translation.en: Excuses to avoid sex and sickness.
translation.ko: 핑계 대며 섹스 피하던 것도 입덧도...

translation.en: When the miscarriage came, you look back and realized
the pregnancy had been difficult from the start.
How do you know my wife? Who the hell are you?
translation.ko: 내 아내를 어떻게 알아? 당신 누구야?

translation.en: All right, folks, grab your beers.
Let's get this show on the road.
[sighs] Think of me as a friend that just released you from prison.
-You should be thanking me. -Yeah? Why is that?
Because now you know she's a liar.
translation.ko: 이제 그 여자가 사기꾼인 걸 알았으니까

translation.en: If you need proof, look at your Visa card
and check for a charge to Novelty Funsy.
I'd run DNA checks on your two boys.
Hi, this is Corinne. Leave a message.
Yeah, except Jimmy Hoch making the A's.
translation.ko: 응, 지미 호크도 A팀 된 건 빼고

translation.en: Ah, you know me, Adam. I'm not one for gossip.
Six weeks ago. But he doesn't want anyone knowing.
Anyway, he has this headhunter helping him find a job.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 새 직장 찾아줄 헤드헌터를 구한 거야

translation.en: Jimmy's dad? You're kidding. That's outrageous.
translation.ko: 지미 아빠? 장난해? 말도 안 돼

translation.en: This shit happens all the time.
When it comes to looking after ourselves and our kids, then... [sucks teeth]
All right, see you tomorrow, mate.
She made it up. She was never pregnant.
Now you know she's a liar.
translation.ko: 이제 그 여자가 사기꾼인 걸 알았으니까

translation.en: [recorded voice] To help us deal with your call quickly,
please tell us in a few words why you are calling today.
translation.ko: 전화하신 목적을 몇 단어로 말씀해 주십시오

translation.en: I'm sorry. Could you repeat that?
-I'm sorry. Could you repeat that? -Speak to a fucking human being!
translation.ko: - 죄송합니다, 다시 말씀해 주세요 - 얼른 사람이나 바꿔!

translation.en: Please hold while we connect you to one of our representatives.
Hello. My name's Peter. How can I help you today?
Yeah, there's a... there's a charge on my account
from a while back that I don't recognize.
I think it might be a mistake.
-What's the name of the company? -Novelty Funsy.
And the date of the transaction?
Ah, yeah. Some companies don't bill under their real name.
translation.ko: 아, 청구서 발송명을 다르게 넣는 회사들이 있죠

translation.en: Yeah, like in hotels when adult movies appear as something else.
translation.ko: 시청한 성인 영화 제목을 호텔 측에서 바꿔주듯이요

translation.en: -Uh, so what is it? -It's an online retailer,
so I'll need to raise a specific inquiry
if you're sure this is something that you didn't purchase.
I'll raise the inquiry. Can we get back to you on this number?
translation.ko: 그럼 알아본 후에 이 번호로 연락드려도 될까요?

translation.en: -Is it okay if Daisy stays? -I'll sleep in the spare room.
translation.ko: - 데이지 자고 가도 돼? - 손님방에서 잘게요

translation.en: Brother of their star player. It was inevitable.
translation.ko: 스타 선수의 동생인데 안 뽑힐 리가 있나

translation.en: -I don't want it to be a big thing. -It won't.
This is a very casual kiss.
[woman 2] Oh, my God. How was it?
Just the truth. You know, I said that--
Sit! Now come here. Now, sit!
Many of them happy, and that's not a failure, that's a success.
translation.ko: 행복한 적도 많았으니 실패는 아니고 성공이라고

translation.en: But, you know, now it's time for something else.
I tried a new house analogy,
translation.ko: 집을 새로 짓는 것과 비슷하다고 설득해 봤지만

translation.en: but that all got a bit muddled.
translation.ko: 집을 새로 짓는 것과 비슷하다고 설득해 봤지만 비유가 먹히긴커녕 뒤죽박죽만 됐지

translation.en: He slept in the spare room,
but I think that was mostly symbolic.
Sorry, the infant keeps calling me. I better find out what he wants.
translation.ko: 미안, 꼬마가 자꾸 전화하네 왜 이러는지 받아봐야겠어

translation.en: I'll tell you what it is, some fucking weird shit.
What are you doing on that thing?
Ooh, you're showing your age now, Jo.
translation.ko: 나이 많은 거 티 내시네요, 조

translation.en: It's Johanna. How many times with that?
And anyway, I thought you liked us oldies.
translation.ko: 그리고 원래 우리 같은 노인 좋아한다며?

translation.en: He's not that old. He's not, like, your age.
translation.ko: 그 남자 그렇게 안 늙었어요 선배 연세는 아니죠

translation.en: You said your new man was old enough to be your father.
Yes, technically, but you're actually old enough to be my mother.
translation.ko: 말하자면 그렇다는 건데 선배는 진짜 우리 엄마 연배예요

translation.en: No. No, it's just that, lying there like that.
Oh, it's giving me the creeps.
What is it? Some kind of sheep?
What do you think's going on there, on the leg?
-Are they bite marks? -[bystander 2] I can't look anymore.
translation.ko: 물린 자국일까요? - 더는 못 보겠어요 - 라마인지 확실치 않아요
- 더는 못 보겠어요 - 라마인지 확실치 않아요

translation.en: And judging from the size and the shape of the indents...
I'd say there's a reasonable chance that they're human.
We're just looking into an incident about a mile or so from here which involves an animal.
translation.ko: 여기서 1.5km쯤 떨어진 곳에서 동물 관련 사건이 벌어졌는데

translation.en: Looks very much like a white alpaca.
You think it's one of mine?
Well, logic dictates. You know, they're not the most common--
translation.ko: 그럴 확률이 높죠 그리 흔한 동물은 아니니까...

translation.en: Uh, I-- I'm afraid so. Yes, I'm... I'm sorry.
Have you got any CCTV? You know, any...
It's an alpaca farm, not Port Knox.
translation.ko: 여긴 포트 녹스가 아니라 알파카 농장이에요

translation.en: It's "Fort" Knox. It's where the Americans keep their gold.
translation.ko: F로 시작하는 포트 녹스야 미국인들이 금괴 저장하는 데
아뇨, 앨커트래즈 같은 건 줄 알았어요

translation.en: [man] It's Martin. That Parth fella has just turned up.
-[man 2] Is someone there? -[Martin] He's down there.
translation.ko: - 누구 왔어요? - 밑에 있어 킬란 씨, 이러실래요?

translation.en: [man 2] It's not fucking Silence of the Lambs.
Professionally speaking, I have to tell you that this is...
Well, you are kind of holding him against his will.
I was a cop for 30 years, Adam.
-I understand the definition of kidnap. -[distant banging]
-The door closed behind him. -[man 2] Let me out!
translation.ko: - 저놈 뒤에서 문이 닫혔을 뿐이야 - 이거 열어요!

translation.en: But remember whose side you're on.
All right! All right! All right!
Are you fucking kidding me? I've been down there nearly an hour.
Calm down? I'm calling the police.
-Give me me phone. -I haven't got it.
-Give him his phone. -He's stolen me fuckin' phone!
translation.ko: - 내놔요 - 돌려드려요 내 전화 훔쳐 갔어요!

translation.en: You are. He's an old man that doesn't want to move.
Doesn't wanna sell. He's not interested in your redevelopment program.
translation.ko: 집 팔기 싫으시대요 재개발 계획에도 관심 없고

translation.en: And he really doesn't appreciate you showing up here unannounced,
translation.ko: 예고 없이 찾아와서 수표책 흔들어대는 거

translation.en: waving your big, fat, corporate checkbook around.
Now, we've lodged our objection, we've adhered to the deadline,
and now due process needs to take place.
And due process can be very, very slow.
translation.ko: 그 정당한 법적 절차는 아주 아주 느릴 거요

translation.en: Okay, you're his lawyer. How much does he want?
I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized to go as high as 400,000.
translation.ko: 말하면 안 되지만 40만까지는 내 권한으로 돼요

translation.en: I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized
to say no to whatever you offer.
He can't win, the stupid, old fuck!
translation.ko: 저 멍청한 노인네는 절대 못 이겨!

translation.en: And in the end, trust me,
-You think she sleeps with her alpacas? -[Johanna] Nope.
Maybe gets one in now and again on a cold winter's night.
translation.ko: 추운 겨울밤에는 가끔 데리고 잘 수도 있죠

translation.en: I know a lad who used to sleep with a massive red setter,
translation.ko: 커다란 사냥개를 안고 자는 친구를 알거든요

translation.en: like, under the covers, its head on his pillow.
I said, "Is that not a little--" Stop!
[Johanna] Get an ambulance and call for backup!
Hi. It's Hashim from Derwent Bank.
I believe you put in a request last night
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 사업장 실제 이름 확인 요청하셨죠?

translation.en: for the identity of a company that has the billing name...
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 사업장 실제 이름 확인 요청하셨죠? 청구서에 적혀 있던 이름은...

translation.en: Right. Well, I'm afraid we can't identify exactly what the payment relates to.
translation.ko: 네, 죄송하지만 어떤 대금인지 확실히 알아내지는 못했는데요

translation.en: It seems to be an umbrella title that covers several different websites.
translation.ko: 아마 서로 다른 여러 웹사이트를 통칭하는 것 같습니다

translation.en: I've got a list of the ISP addresses, which I'm happy to send you,
translation.ko: ISP 주소 목록을 입수했으니 보내드릴 수 있는데요

translation.en: but obviously, I can't identify which of these,
translation.ko: 이 중에 정확히 어떤 곳에서 구매하셨는지는

translation.en: if any, is the source of the purchase.
Would you like me to email this to the address we have on file?
Yeah. The lunch thing got canceled.
Oh, come here. Let me hug you.
God, none of your friends are watching.
translation.ko: 친구들도 안 보는데 뭘 그리 튕겨

translation.en: How was the conference? Did Selena behave herself?

translation.ko: 학회는 어땠어? 세리나는 얌전하게 굴었나? 세리나는 아주 프로다웠지

translation.en: right up until the point she dashed outside to vomit.
-Yeah, I'll do it. -Come on, I wanna hear all about footy.
translation.ko: - 그래, 내가 할게 - 가자, 축구 얘기 다 해줘

translation.en: Oh, yeah, she stayed the night.
[woman] I need her to look after Ella for an hour.
She was supposed to play hockey but suddenly decided--
translation.ko: 원래 하키 하러 가야 하는데 얘가 갑자기...

translation.en: [woman] Okay. Well, she's got a stomach ache.
Doesn't feel well, doesn't want to play.
translation.ko: 몸이 안 좋아서 운동 못 한대

translation.en: However, I've got a training run. Triathlon's in three weeks.
translation.ko: 난 3주 후에 철인 3종 경기라 훈련해야 해서...

translation.en: If you're sick I need to make sure you're with someone.
translation.ko: 딸이 아프다는데 혼자 두고 갈 수는 없잖아

translation.en: It's all right. We can take her for an hour.
Ugh. I don't know what's wrong with her.
Doesn't want to go to school, doesn't want to play sports.
-She's making up the tummy ache thing. -You know, she's at that age.
translation.ko: - 배 아프다는 것도 거짓말일걸 - 그럴 나이잖아

translation.en: Want me to try talking to her?
I supposed it could be worse. Did you hear about Dante?
translation.ko: 그래도 최악은 아니야 단테이 소식 들었지?

translation.en: He didn't come home last night.
I was having a surrogate pregnancy.
to pretend that I was going through the normal cycles.
translation.ko: 임신 시기별 증상을 재연하며 임신한 척했어요

translation.en: I'm just showing him what teachers get up to outside of school.
translation.ko: 선생님들이 학교 밖에서 뭘 하는지 보여줬어

translation.en: -What the hell are you talking about? -Can we just skip this part?
-What? -The part where you pretend not to know
what I'm talking about. Let's just skip the denials, okay?
I know you faked your pregnancy.
Well, if you know, why are you asking?
Are you out of your mind?
You faked a pregnancy, Corinne. What else are you capable of?
Look at Tom's face, your eyes, your-- your-- your hair.
translation.ko: 톰 얼굴을 봐 당신 눈에 당신 머리칼이잖아

translation.en: How... How can you even ask me that?
What makes you think I faked a pregnancy?
It's a cover name for a fake pregnancy website.
translation.ko: 가짜 임신 웹사이트인 걸 교묘히 숨기는 이름이지

translation.en: -Right. How do you know that was for me? -Was it?
What are you even doing looking through bank statements--?
translation.ko: 애초에 카드 대금 내역은 왜 본 건데?

translation.en: Now, you better start talking right now.
Do you remember when I had two school periods off during lunch?
translation.ko: 점심시간 후에 수업 두 시간씩 비던 때 기억나?

translation.en: Well, I used to get out of school for a couple of hours.
I'd go to that café in Portis Books.
I'd get a cup of tea, sit in the corner reading,
translation.ko: 차 한 잔 시키고 구석에 앉아 책을 읽다 보니

translation.en: and after a while, Adam, you become a regular.
The same people will be there like a community--
translation.ko: 무슨 모임처럼 맨날 같은 사람들이 오고...

translation.en: She was eight months pregnant. It was her first baby.
You know how young mothers-to-be are, all glowing
translation.ko: 젊은 예비 엄마들 어떤지 알지? 잔뜩 들떠서

translation.en: and over the top like they're the first person to get pregnant--
translation.ko: 이 세상 최초로 임신한 사람들인 양...

translation.en: Great story. Can we get back to the fucking elephant sat here?
translation.ko: 잘 들었어, 이제 망할 본론으로 돌아가 주지?

translation.en: Can you just drop the sarcasm, Adam?
I'm trying to tell you something.
And then one day she just stopped coming.
translation.ko: 그런데 어느 날부터 안 오는 거야

translation.en: Now, I... I just assumed she'd had the baby.
But she didn't reply to any of my messages.
translation.ko: 근데 아무리 문자를 보내도 답이 없었어

translation.en: And she just killed all my calls--
-Is this going somewhere? -A few months later,
translation.ko: - 결론이 있긴 해? - 몇 달 뒤에

translation.en: I saw her again in Starbucks near the library and she was pregnant.
translation.ko: 도서관 근처 스타벅스에서 다시 만났는데 임신 중인 거야

translation.en: Heavily pregnant, Adam, like eight months.
Well, it didn't make any sense.
So I just-- I held back and I watched her.
And she was with this group of other women in the corner
holding court, talking to them about... about baby names.
translation.ko: 즐겁게 떠들고 있더라 아기 이름 후보들을 말하면서

translation.en: And when she saw me she just looked terrified.
translation.ko: 그러다 날 보더니 소스라치게 놀라는 거야

translation.en: Did you say something to her?
She told me some story about having a stillborn. I don't know if it was true--
translation.ko: 사산했다느니 어쩌느니 하는데 사실인지 알 수가...

translation.en: Corinne, what are you talking about?
No, no, Corinne, that is not normal behavior.
Yeah, well, she said her husband didn't care about her. She had no--
translation.ko: 남편이 자기한테 신경을 안 썼대, 그래서...

translation.en: What does this got to do with us? You've got children, got me.
translation.ko: 그게 우리랑 뭔 상관이야? 당신은 애들도 있고 나도 있는데

translation.en: Crazy Suzanne and her shitty little life made you think, "I'll fake a baby."
translation.ko: 미친 여자가 헛짓하고 사는데 '나도 따라 해야지'?

translation.en: Why would you fake a baby, Corinne?
For attention? Is this some kind of deranged midlife crisis?
translation.ko: 관심 끌려고? 중년의 위기 같은 건가?

translation.en: But you need to tell me everything from start to finish--
translation.ko: 하지만 처음부터 끝까지 다 설명하지 않으면...

translation.en: -You're not just gonna walk away. -What are you gonna do? Keep me captive?
translation.ko: - 어딜 그냥 가? - 어쩌게? 가두기라도 하게?

translation.en: What are you gonna do, Adam? Beat it out of me?
translation.ko: 싫다면 어쩔 건데? 두들겨 패서라도 듣게?

translation.en: A woman, a stranger. I've never seen her before.
translation.ko: 전혀 모르는 여자였어 난생처음 보는 여자가

translation.en: -She came up to me and she-- -What woman?
I've just told you, a stranger.
How does she know any of this?
translation.ko: 그 여자가 이런 걸 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: And you, what, you just believed her?
I will, I promise, but just...

translation.ko: - 무슨 일 있어요? - 아무 일 없어

translation.en: Could've hit a tree, could've been something else.
translation.ko: 나무나 다른 뭔가에 부딪친 것 같다고

translation.en: They're guessing he'd been there for hours.
translation.ko: 몇 시간은 거기 있었던 것 같대
